channel.title: Shortcodes on Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Shortcodes on Hugo Relearn Theme

item.title: Badge
item.description: The badge shortcode displays little markers in your text with adjustable color, title and icon.

item.title: Button
item.description: The button shortcode displays a clickable button with adjustable color, title and icon.

item.title: Children
item.description: The children shortcode lists the child pages of the current page and its descendants.

item.title: Expand
item.description: The expand shortcode displays an expandable/collapsible section of text. Expand me… Thank you!

item.title: Highlight
item.description: The highlight shortcode renders your code with a syntax highlighter.

item.title: Icon
item.description: The icon shortcode displays icons using the Font Awesome library.

item.title: Include
item.description: The include shortcode includes other files from your project inside of the current page.

item.title: Math
item.description: The math shortcode generates beautiful formatted math and chemical formulae using the MathJax library.

item.title: Mermaid
item.description: The mermaid shortcode generates diagrams and flowcharts from text, in a similar manner as Markdown using the Mermaid library.

item.title: Notice
item.description: The notice shortcode shows various types of disclaimers with adjustable color, title and icon to help you structure your page.

item.title: OpenAPI
item.description: The openapi shortcode uses the Swagger UI library to display your OpenAPI / Swagger specifications.

item.title: Resources
item.description: The resources shortcode displays the titles of resources contained in a page bundle.

item.title: SiteParam
item.description: The siteparam shortcode prints values of site params. Usage While the examples are using shortcodes with named parameter you are free to use positional as well or call this shortcode from your own partials.

item.title: Tab
item.description: You can use a tab shortcode to display a single tab.

item.title: Tabs
item.description: The tabs shortcode displays arbitrary content in an unlimited number of tabs.
